t=this.loading?h("calcite-loader",{active:true,label:this.intlLoading}):null;var a=h("div",{class:CSS.scrim},t);var e=h("div",{class:CSS.content},h("slot",null));return h(Host,null,a,e)};return t}();CalciteScrim.style=calciteScrimCss;export{CalciteScrim as calcite_scrim};
